alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 1:52PM EDT until April 05 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1251 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a line of severe thunderstorms capable of producing damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. These storms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Samson to near Baker, and moving east at 35 mph. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Samson, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Paxton, Coffee Springs, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Chancellor, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Lytle, Darlington, Marl, Arrant Settlement, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Geneva Municipal A/P, Glendale, Center Ridge and New Harmony. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
